title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 29 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 29 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Give unto the LORD, O ye mighty, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
lineList.cn: 神的众子阿，你们要将荣耀能力，归给耶和华。归给耶和华。

lineList.en: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name; worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
lineList.cn: 要将耶和华的名所当得的荣耀归给他。以圣洁的妆饰敬拜耶和华。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD is upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the LORD is upon many waters.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音在水上。荣耀的神打雷，耶和华打雷在大水之上。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音大有能力。耶和华的声音满有威严。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD breaketh the cedars; yea, the LORD breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音震破香柏树。耶和华震碎黎巴嫩的香柏树。

lineList.en: He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
lineList.cn: 他也使之跳跃如牛犊，使黎巴嫩和西连跳跃如野牛犊。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD divideth the flames of fire.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音使火焰分岔。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD shaketh the wilderness; the LORD shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音震动旷野。耶和华震动加低斯的旷野。

lineList.en: The voice of the LORD maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
lineList.cn: 耶和华的声音惊动母鹿落胎，树木也脱落净光。凡在他殿中的，都称说他的荣耀。

lineList.en: The LORD sitteth upon the flood; yea, the LORD sitteth King for ever.
lineList.cn: 洪水泛滥之时，耶和华坐着为王。耶和华坐着为王，直到永远。

lineList.en: The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.
lineList.cn: 耶和华必赐力量给他的百姓。耶和华必赐平安的福给他的百姓。
